name: Experience Project
introduction: The Experience Project feature ensures, upon installation, that your Hippo CMS project is a BloomReach Experience project.
description: Please note that this component is a BloomReach Experience only component, it does not work in the community edition of Hippo CMS. Installing this feature will convert your project to a BloomReach Experience project and might result in unexpected and unsupported behaviour of the project if you do not have an Enterprise license.
